Here's a simple bubble sort subroutine: 

subroutine bubble_sort(arr) 

    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:) 

    integer :: i, j, temp, n 

    n = size(arr) 

    do i = 1, n-1 

        do j = 1, n-i 

            if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then 

                temp = arr(j) 

                arr(j) = arr(j+1) 

                arr(j+1) = temp 

            end if 

        end do 

    end do 

end subroutine bubble_sort
